markup_reference.title: To create a single number or a numbered list, select the line(s) of text you want to number and click on the number icon on the editing toolbar. To remove the numbered format, simply highlight the desired text and click the number icon again.
markup_reference.note: Starting with Mingle 13.3, you can also use the keyboard shortcut CTRL + SHIFT + 7 to add or remove number lists.
